species.name: skwovet
descriptions: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.
It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.

abilities.name: cheek-pouch
abilities.effect: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.
